# Model {.tabset .tabset-fade}

 <!-- .tabset-pills -->

## basic

2arm bandit 

```{r}
  function(par, a) {
  a = a[with(a, order(start)), ]
  nll = 0
  if (par[1] < 0 | par[1] > 1 |
      par[2] < 0 | par[2] > 50) {
    nll = Inf
  } else {
    Q = c(0, 0)
    P <- vector()
    rewards = a$dooropened
    sides = ceiling(a$corner / 2)
    for (i in seq_along(sides)) {
      r = rewards[i]
      s = sides[i]
      if (is.finite(s) & is.finite(r)) {
        P = exp(par[2] * Q) / sum(exp(par[2] * Q))
        if(any(P < .001)){
          index = which(P < .001)
          P[index] = .001; P[-(index)] = .999}
        nll = -log(P[s]) + nll
        pe = r - Q[s]
        Q[s] = Q[s] + (par[1] * pe)}}}
  nll}
```

## dual

learning rate split by reward

```{r}
function(par, a) {
    a = a[with(a, order(start)), ]
    nll = 0
    if (par[1] < 0 | par[1] > 1 |
        par[2] < 0 | par[2] > 50 |
        par[3] < 0 | par[3] > 1) {
      nll = Inf
    } else {
      Q = c(0, 0)
      P <- vector()
      rewards = a$dooropened
      sides = ceiling(a$corner / 2)
      for (i in seq_along(sides)) {
        r = rewards[i]
        s = sides[i]
        if (is.finite(s) & is.finite(r)) {
          P = exp(par[2] * Q) / sum(exp(par[2] * Q))
          if(any(P < .001)){
            index = which(P < .001)
            P[index] = .001; P[-(index)] = .999}
          nll = -log(P[s]) + nll
          pe = r - Q[s]
          if (r == 1) {Q[s] = Q[s] + (par[1] * pe)
          } else {Q[s] = Q[s] + (par[3] * pe)}}}}
    nll}
```

## attention

lerning rate related to prediction error

```{r}
function(par, a) {
    a = a[with(a, order(start)), ]
    nll = 0
    if (par[1] < 0 | par[1] > 1 |
        par[2] < 0 | par[2] > 50 |
        par[3] < 0 | par[3] > 1) {
      nll = Inf
    } else {
      Q = c(0, 0)
      P <- vector()
      rewards = a$dooropened
      sides = ceiling(a$corner / 2)
      alpha.zero = par[1]
      for (i in seq_along(sides)) {
        r = rewards[i]
        s = sides[i]
        if (is.finite(s) & is.finite(r)) {
          P = exp(par[2] * Q) / sum(exp(par[2] * Q))
          if(any(P < .001)){
            index = which(P < .001)
            P[index] = .001; P[-(index)] = .999}
          nll = -log(P[s]) + nll
          pe = r - Q[s]
          alpha = par[3] * abs(pe) + (1 - par[3]) * alpha.zero
          Q[s] = Q[s] + (alpha * pe)}}}
    nll}
```

## fictitious

subsequent update of nonchosen alternative

```{r}
function(par, a) {
    a = a[with(a, order(start)), ]
    nll = 0
    if ((par[1] < 0 | par[1] > 1) |
        (par[2] < 0 | par[2] > 50)) {
      nll = Inf
    } else {
      Q = c(0, 0)
      P <- vector()
      rewards = a$dooropened
      sides = ceiling(a$corner / 2)
      for (i in seq_along(sides)) {
        r = rewards[i]
        s = sides[i]
        if (is.finite(s) & is.finite(r)) {
          P = exp(par[2] * Q) / sum(exp(par[2] * Q))
          if(any(P < .001)){
            index = which(P < .001)
            P[index] = .001; P[-(index)] = .999}
          nll = -log(P[s]) + nll
          pe = r - Q[s]
          Q[s] = Q[s] + (par[1] * pe)
          Q[-s] = Q[-s] - (par[1] * pe)}}}
    nll}
```

```{r}
function(par, a) {

    nll = 0

        par[2] < 0 | par[2] > 50 |

            P[index] = .001; P[-(index)] = .999}
          nll = -log(P[s]) + nll
```

## forgetful

applied Collins et al. idea of forgetting `{cit}`

```{r}
function(par, a) {
    a = a[with(a, order(start)), ]
    nll = 0
    if (par[1] < 0 | par[1] > 1 |
        par[2] < 0 | par[2] > 50 |
        par[3] < 0 | par[3] > 1) {
      nll = Inf
    } else {
      Q = c(0, 0)
      P <- vector()
      rewards = a$dooropened
      sides = ceiling(a$corner / 2)
      for (i in seq_along(sides)) {
        r = rewards[i]
        s = sides[i]
        if (is.finite(s) & is.finite(r)) {
          P = exp(par[2] * Q) / sum(exp(par[2] * Q))
          if(any(P < .001)){
            index = which(P < .001)
            P[index] = .001; P[-(index)] = .999}
          nll = -log(P[s]) + nll
          pe = r - Q[s]
          Q[s] = Q[s] + par[1] * pe
          delta = 0.5 - Q[s]
          Q[s] = Q[s] + par[3] * delta
          Q[-s] = Q[-s] + par[3] * delta}}}
    nll}
```

## decay

decay of expected reward along with time, for both sides

```{r}
function(par, a) {
    a = a[with(a, order(start)), ]
    nll = 0
    if (par[1] < 0 | par[1] > 1 |
        par[2] < 0 | par[2] > 50 |
        par[3] < 0 | par[3] > 1) {
      nll = Inf
    } else {
      # temp = nrow(a)
      tempQ = c()
      Q = c(0, 0)
      date = rep(a$start[1], 2)
      t = c(0, 0)
      P <- vector()
      rewards = a$dooropened
      sides = ceiling(a$corner/2)
      nows = a$start
      for (i in seq_along(sides)) {
        r = rewards[i]
        s = sides[i]
        now = nows[i]
        t = as.numeric(difftime(now, date, units = 'mins'))
        date[s] = now
        if (is.finite(s) & is.finite(r)) {
          Q[s] = exp( -(t[s]) * par[3] ) * Q[s]
          tempQ = exp( -(t[-s]) * par[3] ) * Q[-s]
          P[s] = exp(par[2] * Q[s]) / 
            (sum(exp(par[2] * Q[s]), exp(par[2] * tempQ)))
          if(P[s] < .001){P[s] = .001}
          if(P[s] > .999){P[s] = .999}
          nll = -log(P[s]) + nll
          pe = r - Q[s]
          Q[s] = Q[s] + (par[1] * pe)}}}
    nll}
```

## decay+

```{r}
function(par, a) {
  a = a[with(a, order(start)), ]
  nll = 0
  if (par[1] < 0 | par[1] > 1 |
      par[2] < 0 | par[2] > 50 |
      par[3] < 0 | par[3] > 1 |
      par[4] < 0 | par[4] > 1) {
    nll = Inf
  } else {
    tempQ = c()
    Q = c(0, 0)
    date = rep(a$start[1], 2)
    t = c(0, 0)
    P <- vector()
    rewards = a$dooropened
    sides = ceiling(a$corner/2)
    nows = a$start
    rew = c(0,0)
    for (i in seq_along(sides)) {
      r = rewards[i]
      s = sides[i]
      now = nows[i]
      t = as.numeric(difftime(now, date, units = 'mins'))
      date[s] = now
      if (is.finite(s) & is.finite(r)) {
        decay = ifelse(rew == 1, par[3], par[4])
        Q[s] = exp( -(t[s]) * decay[s] ) * Q[s]
        tempQ = exp( -(t[-s]) * decay[-s] ) * Q[-s]
        P[s] = exp(par[2] * Q[s]) / 
          (sum(exp(par[2] * Q[s]), exp(par[2] * tempQ)))
        if(P[s] < .001){P[s] = .001}
        if(P[s] > .999){P[s] = .999}
        nll = -log(P[s]) + nll
        pe = r - Q[s]
        Q[s] = Q[s] + (par[1] * pe)
        Q[-s] = Q[-s] + (par[1] * pe)
        rew[s] = r}}}
  nll}
```

## decay++

also decay with threshold (combined functions)

```{r}
function(par, a) {
    a = a[with(a, order(start)), ]
    nll = 0
    if (par[1] < 0 | par[1] > 1 |
        par[2] < 0 | par[2] > 50 |
        par[3] < 0 | par[3] > 1 |
        par[4] < 0 | par[4] > 1 |
        par[5] < 1 | par[5] > 60) {
      nll = Inf
    } else {
      tempQ = c()
      Q = c(0, 0)
      date = rep(a$start[1], 2)
      t = c(0, 0)
      P <- vector()
      rewards = a$dooropened
      sides = ceiling(a$corner/2)
      nows = a$start
      rew = c(0,0)
      for (i in seq_along(sides)) {
        r = rewards[i]
        s = sides[i]
        now = nows[i]
        t = as.numeric(difftime(now, date, units = 'mins'))
        date[s] = now
        if (is.finite(s) & is.finite(r)) {
          decay = ifelse(rew == 1, par[3], par[4])
          if(t[s] > par[5]){ 
            Q[s] = exp( -(t[s]) * decay[s] ) * Q[s]}
          tempQ = ifelse(t[-s] > par[5], 
            exp( -(t[-s]) * decay[-s] ) * Q[-s],
            Q[-s])
          P[s] = exp(par[2] * Q[s]) / 
            (sum(exp(par[2] * Q[s]), exp(par[2] * tempQ)))
          if(P[s] < .001){P[s] = .001}
          if(P[s] > .999){P[s] = .999}
          nll = -log(P[s]) + nll
          pe = r - Q[s]
          Q[s] = Q[s] + (par[1] * pe)
          rew[s] = r}}}
    nll}
```

```{r}
  a = a[with(a, order(start)), ]
  nll = 0
  if (par[1] < 0 | par[1] > 50 |
      par[2] < 0 | par[2] > 1 |
      par[3] < 0 | par[3] > 1) {
    nll = Inf
  } else {
    Q = c(0, 0)
    date = rep(a$start[1], 2)
    t = c(0, 0)
    P <- vector()
    rewards = a$dooropened
    sides = ceiling(a$corner/2)
    nows = a$start
    rew = c(0,0)
    for (i in seq_along(sides)) {
      r = rewards[i]
      s = sides[i]
      now = nows[i]
      t = as.numeric(difftime(now, date, units = 'mins'))
      date[s] = now
      if (is.finite(s) & is.finite(r)) {
        decay = ifelse(rew == 1, par[2], par[3])
        Q[s] = exp( -(t[s]) * decay[s] ) * Q[s]  
        tempQ = exp( -(t[-s]) * decay[-s] ) * Q[-s]
        P[s] = exp(par[1] * Q[s]) / 
          (sum(exp(par[1] * Q[s]), exp(par[1] * tempQ)))
        if(P[s] < .001){P[s] = .001}
        if(P[s] > .999){P[s] = .999}
        nll = -log(P[s]) + nll
        pe = r - Q[s]
        Q[s] = Q[s] + pe
        rew[s] = r}}}
  nll}
```

## reproval

Probability rises along with interval between the subsequent choices 
Restriction put on the value - max 11h
termed also `reproval660`

```{r}
function(par, a) {
    a = a[with(a, order(start)), ]
    nll = 0
    if (par[1] < 0 | par[1] > 1 |
        par[2] < 0 | par[2] > 50 |
        par[3] < 0 | par[3] > 1) {
      nll = Inf
    } else {
      Q = c(0, 0)
      P <- vector()
      b0 = 0
      rewards = a$dooropened
      sides = ceiling(a$corner / 2)
      previous = lag(sides)
      previous[1] = 1
      intervals = a$intervalb
      intervals[1] = 0
      for (i in seq_along(sides)) {
        r = rewards[i]
        s = sides[i]
        w = previous[i]
        t = intervals[i]
        if (is.finite(s) & is.finite(r)) { 
          P = exp(par[2] * Q) / sum(exp(par[2] * Q))
          b0 = log(P[w] / (1 - P[w]))
          if(t > 660) t = 660
          P[w] = exp(b0 + par[3] * t) / 
            (1 + exp(b0 + par[3] * t))
          P[-w] = 1 - P[w]
          if(any(P < .001)){
            index = which(P < .001)
            P[index] = .001; P[-(index)] = .999}
          nll = -log(P[s]) + nll
          pe = r - Q[s] 
          Q[s] = Q[s] + (par[1] * pe)}}}
    nll}
```

## bandit-4-arm

Applied on sequence of all visits. Water corners reward value equals 0.5

`{r} dataset: dmodel4arm`

```{r}
 function(par, a) {
    a = a[with(a, order(start)), ]
    nll = 0
    if (par[1] < 0 | par[1] > 1 |
        par[2] < 0 | par[2] > 50) {
      nll = Inf
    } else {
      Q = c(0, 0, 0, 0)
      P <- vector()
      rewards = a$dooropened
      sides = a$corner
      for (i in seq_along(sides)) {
        r = rewards[i]
        s = sides[i]
        if (is.finite(s) & is.finite(r)) {
          P = exp(par[2] * Q) / sum(exp(par[2] * Q))
          if(P[s] < .001){P[s] = .001}
          if(P[s] > .999){P[s] = .999}
          nll = -log(P[s]) + nll
          pe = r - Q[s]
          Q[s] = Q[s] + (par[1] * pe)}}}
    nll}
```
